item.title: Faith, Service, Constancy
item.description:
Faith, Service, Constancy by Elder David S. Baxter, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 176th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2006
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder David S. Baxter, Of the Seventy

item.title: Faith, Fortitude, Fulfillment: A Message to Single Parents
item.description:
Faith, Fortitude, Fulfillment: A Message to Single Parents by Elder David S. Baxter, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 182nd Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2012
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
